'''1.3''' is a server version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released with client version [[Classic 0.0.17a|0.0.17a]] on June 10, 2009.<ref>{{tumblr|Notch|121313306|Client 0.0.17a, server 1.3|June 10, 2009}}</ref>

== Additions ==
* Added server support for the admin command {{cmd|setspawn}}.
* Pressing {{key|tab}} now shows all players logged in to the server.
* Chat now shows the full log of recent messages.
* Name security.{{more info}}
* Server-side client verification.
* A <samp>logged-in.txt</samp> server file.{{more info}}

== Changes ==
* Made {{cmd|ban-ip}} work more intuitively.
* Changed the behavior of private server addresses.
* No level generation or loading in MP mode.{{more info|Removed this, for fixed this being missing?}}

== Fixes ==
* Fixed the server heartbeat check pausing the game.
* Fixed players' spawn location changing to default when they log in.
* Fixed the game not starting on Mac OS computers.
* Clients can no longer spam ping requests.
* Various server fill exploit preventions, players can no longer create lava floods.
